section.title: Description
section.p: The CLI tools are provided to manage and monitor clusters, servers, vBuckets, XDCR, and so on. They can be located in a number of directories, dependent on the tool in question in each case. By default, the command-line tools are installed into the following locations on each platform:

row.entry: C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin, C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin\install, and C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin\tools.

refbody.section:
Managing diagnistics The command-line interface provides commands to start, stop, and report status for log collection.
You can collect diagnostics through the command-line interface by using either the couchbase-cli tool or the cbcollect_info tool.
